thread.title: The mayor invites Tucsonans to Earth Day Clean Up Event | News | kvoa.com
thread.title_full: The mayor invites Tucsonans to Earth Day Clean Up Event | News | kvoa.com

author: Zachary Jackson
title: The mayor invites Tucsonans to Earth Day Clean Up Event | News | kvoa.com
text: TUCSON, Ariz. (KVOA) — Help keep Tucson clean and beautiful with this Earth Day event. Mayor Romero, City of Tucson and Tucson Clean and Beautiful Celebrate Earth Day 2024 Beautifying the 29th Street Thrive Zone Team Up to Clean Up and Mayor Regina Romero are inviting you to join the 29th Street Thrive community, Tucson Clean and Beautiful, and other volunteers to take part in a Earth Day Clean Up Event. The 29th Street Thrive Zone is the area located within Alvernon Way, 22nd St., Craycroft Rd, and 29th St.. “Our expansion into the 29th Street Thrive Zone will bring people, businesses and organizations together with the City to help identify the investments needed to revitalize this area. This day of service is a great way to kick off Earth Week by caring for Tucson neighborhoods,” said Tucson Mayor Regina Romero. “I want to thank the neighbors, City of Tucson employees, and Tucson Clean and Beautiful. This is a great example of what we can accomplish when we come together,” said the Mayor. The event takes place on Friday, April 19 from 8:30 a.m. to 10:30 a.m.at Pima Community College, 29th Street Coalition Center, 4355 E. Calle Aurora. RSVP to the event here: [https://arcg.is/0bD8vL](https://arcg.is/0bD8vL) While you’re helping keep Tucson clean, make sure to stay safe by bringing the following items: - Reusable water bottle - Hat - Sunglasses - Closed-toe, sturdy shoes - Long pants; long sleeves - Sturdy gloves, if you have them The following resources will be provided for volunteers: - Sunscreen - Park patrols-trash grabber - Gloves - Safety vests - Water SIGN UP: [Sign Up For Our Email Alerts](https://www.kvoa.com/contact/email/) APPS: [Download Our News App](https://www.kvoa.com/contact/apps) WATCH LIVE: [Watch News 4 Tucson LIVE](https://www.kvoa.com/livestream)
